short_desc: Report scams to help disrupt and warn others.
Report phishing, identity theft, or hacking to the ACSC.
Report scams and consumer issues if you are in Victoria.
Report scams and unsafe practices if you are in NSW.
Report scams directly to WA ScamNet.
Report online abuse, cyberbullying, or harassment.
Report online abuse based on age discrimination.
Report racial hatred or ethnic discrimination.
Report discrimination or harassment based on gender or sexuality.
Report hate or discrimination based on religion.
Report immediate threats of harm or violence.
Get urgent help or report self-harm risks.
Report sexual exploitation, image-based abuse, or harassment.
Report false or misleading information affecting consumers.
Report account impersonation, fake identities, or fraud.
